standard_workflows.analysis_params

standard_workflows.analysis_params#

Analysis Parameters Definition of default parameters and dataset specific parameters in a python dictionary that is saved as yaml file. This is a non redundant representation of all analysis paths.

Functions

run_test()

update(analysis)

Updates analysis_params values of the analysis obj according to the values above saves a copy of them as a yaml file.
